=====================================

**Request for Proposal: Acquisition of Spectrometer**
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** WS3684845604-Doc3684898153

**Solicitation Number:** WS3684845604

**Publication Date:** October 3, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** October 19, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Objective:**
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is seeking proposals for the acquisition, delivery, and training of a spectrometer for the Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Center in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
The following UNSPSC categories are included in this tender:

* Laboratory and scientific equipment
* Spectroscopic equipment

**Selection Criteria:**
The selection criteria is based on lowest price.

**Participation Basis:**
This procurement is open to all eligible bidders.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Regions of Delivery:**
This contract will be delivered to the following location:

* Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Contact Name: Renee-Ann Therien
* Email: renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not Available

**Tender Documents and Information:**
All tender documents and information can be found on the following website:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14265180?extsite=MTQyNjUxODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: October 19, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: March 1, 2028

**Note:**
Please ensure that all required supporting documentation and bid submission is submitted by the tender closing date. All bids submitted after the closing date will be declared non-responsive.
